description:
jLight is a full-featured flashlight app with all the functions you've come to know and love:
Bright white light? Of course. Strobe light? Naturally. SOS mode?  Wouldn't leave home without it.  Additional features include 'Save Settings' and 'Tap' functions.  Like a blue strobe light?  Select Save and on the next start-up the app will be in 'blue strobe' mode.  Tap out your own Morse code, or use Tap to change colors.  Want to try something other than white light?  Just tap the screen and cycle through a variety of colors - Aqua, Lime, Yellow, and many more.  Download and enjoy!
